holidays.title: Cow Milked While Flying in an Airplane Day
holidays.description: Get ready to be amused by Elm Farm Ollie’s calmness and massive generosity.

holidays.title: Gambia Independence Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate Gambia Independence Day and the end of Africa’s colonization.

holidays.title: Losar
holidays.description: Cheers to a new year filled with prosperity as we mark Losar, Bhutanese New Year.

holidays.title: National Battery Day
holidays.description: While remaining charged, batteries will keep you connected even when the power is out.

holidays.title: National Crab Stuffed Flounder Day
holidays.description: Experience this mouth-watering dish created with the savory flavors of the sea.

holidays.title: Pluto Day
holidays.description: Do you know why a day on Pluto is equivalent to 6.4 Earth days?

holidays.title: Ramadan Begins
holidays.description: Let us join our Muslim brothers and observe Ramadan with fasting, prayer, and faithful intention.

holidays.title: Sonam Losar
holidays.description: Experience the exotic Tamang culture in Nepal on Sonam Lhosar.

holidays.title: Thumb Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Thumbs exhibit the forms of emotion that the body it is attached to feels. Here’s how.

holidays.title: Tsagaan Sar
holidays.description: Get ready to bring in the best of luck this Mongolian Lunar New Year.

holidays.title: Damien Prince’s Birthday
holidays.description: From a troubled youth to becoming an icon, Damien Prince’s hustle to fame is truly inspiring!

holidays.title: Dr. Dre’s Birthday
holidays.description: The music doctor who prescribed the world a large dose of good songs and talent.

holidays.title: Hansol Vernon Chwe’s Birthday
holidays.description: Born in one country and raised in another, today he is a global icon!

holidays.title: John Travolta’s Birthday
holidays.description: Travolta is a global movie star whose skill and talent shine through every role he plays.

holidays.title: Vanna White’s Birthday
holidays.description: She first made a mark in the ‘80s, then turned into a star that shines forever!

holidays.title: Yoko Ono’s Birthday
holidays.description: During her more than half-decade career, she had several hit music albums.
